email_chain.subject: Rate Inquiry - Soybean Shipment from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Peter,

I hope this message finds you well. We are looking to ship 12,000 MT of soybeans from Santos to Rotterdam under CIF terms. Could you please provide a freight quote and suggest a suitable vessel?

Best regards,
Laura Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Inquiry - Soybean Shipment from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

Thank you for your inquiry. I can offer the vessel OCEAN TRADER, with a DWT of 45,000 and LOA of 200m. The initial freight quote is USD 45 per MT. The laycan is set for 1st to 5th April.

Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Peter Wilson

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Inquiry - Soybean Shipment from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Peter,

Thank you for the prompt response. USD 45 per MT seems a bit high. Could you consider lowering the rate to USD 42 per MT? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Best regards,
Laura Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Inquiry - Soybean Shipment from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

Considering our long-term relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD 43 per MT. The demurrage rate is set at USD 8,000 per day. The laycan remains 1st to 5th April.

Please let me know if this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Peter Wilson

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Inquiry - Soybean Shipment from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Peter,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD 43 per MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best regards,
Laura Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Inquiry - Soybean Shipment from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Santos on 1st April, with a 24-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Peter Wilson

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Inquiry - Soybean Shipment from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Peter,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best regards,
Laura Martinez
